website_summaries.verdict: A highly affordable, highly portable sauna that comes with a bonus foot massager.
pros: Easy to pack up for travel
Comes with a folding chair and a wooden massage roller for your feet
cons: Might be too tight of a fit for individuals over 6 feet tall

customer_reviews.title: She says that it helps but I was amazed that after I used it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the sauna for my mother, because she has pain in her knees and back, and she used it everyday since we got it for 15-20 minutes a day. She says that it helps but I was amazed that after I used it, I slept for ten hours straight. This is straightforward to use, and easy to assemble. It gets nice and hot. The experience of using the sauna is very close to the experience of going to the spa, but it is more convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Boorstein

customer_reviews.title: It's too soon to give a detailed review since I have only used it twice but my initial feeling is that I really like it. It is light weight but seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received the portable sauna. It's too soon to give a detailed review since I have only used it twice but my initial feeling is that I really like it. It is light weight but seems to be well made (I will see how it holds up to regular use). It is simple to setup. I couldn't find the instructions when I took it out of the box but was able to assemble without them. I later found the instructions within the plastic wrapping. I will update my review after I have had a chance to use it for a month or two. For now, I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sascha B.

customer_reviews.title: seems to work great. Wouldn’t mind if the chair was more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got this last week, seems to work great. Wouldn’t mind if the chair was more comfortable. It’s not the most comfortable chair to sit on especially if you plan on doing longer sessions in this sauna but for the price it gets the job done and you can be creative on how to deal with the uncomfortable seating. Definitely heats up and seems to stay heated at the temperature you select. I’m happy with the purchase, so far so good!

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This sauna works very well. Heat levels is easily adjusted and the foot pad can be turned on or off while still using the sauna. It's important to not sauna for too long as you can overly deplete your minerals. It's also super important to stay hydrated during and after, while also taking in electrolytes. I do have concerns that regular use of infrared saunas may be too depleting while also activating pathogens in our systems and possibly negatively affect bone density (just a theory). Still a very cost effective way to sweat.

customer_reviews.title: A skeptic proved wrong
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that a flat pack home sauna could do the job. I was wrong...so very wrong. Except for finding the foot pads a bit too hot, I am convinced that this inexpensive alternative to the classic steam cabinet sauna is just a good. Wow! Did I really write that? Yes, this sauna reached a heat level suitable for a proper all-over sweat. It was relaxing, sweaty, and effective. After a cold shower I felt clean and detoxed as only a sauna can provide. So if you are on the fence about this purchase, I hope my words will encourage you to ‘take the plunge’ and treat yourself to a healthy relaxing sauna in your own home.
